txt.en: 'You have earned the trust of my people, [placeholder], but it will do you no good to pass beneath the eaves of the forest unless someone alerts the archers hidden along the border of your nature.\n\n'I will do this. Speak to me again when you wish to enter Lothl贸rien.'
'I will spread the word to my people that you are not an enemy, [placeholder]. You can now pass beyond the borders of Lothl贸rien without incident.'
You have earned the trust of the Elves of Lothl贸rien, and the Galadhrim Archers at the border must be told you are not an enemy.
The Galadhrim Look-outs along the border are waiting to speak with you.
